epicyst 1.0.2
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Introduction to epicyst

Set up

Set_up.Rd

Caculates internal parameters and equilbirum staring values for state variables

set_up(
  LEP = 1,
  delta = 960000,
  HPS = 10000,
  PPS = 2000,
  TPrev = 0.02,
  CPrev = 0.07,
  PCPrev = 0.2,
  AEL = 2,
  ATL = 2,
  ADI = 3,
  LEH = 54,
  phi = 0.8,
  chi = 0.5,
  RR_cysticercosis = 1,
  epsilon = 0.01,
  RR_infection = 1,
  RR_consumption = -0.25
)

Arguments

LEP

Pig life expectancy (years)
delta

Egg production rate (per month)
HPS

Human population size
PPS

Pig population size
TPrev

Taeniasis prevalence
CPrev

Cysticercosis prevalence in humans
PCPrev

Cysticercosis prevalence in pigs
AEL

Average life expectancy of egg in the environment (weeks)
ATL

Average life expectancy of T. solium adult worm in human (years)
ADI

Average duration of cycticercosis infection in humans (years)
LEH

Average life expectancy of a human (years)
phi

Proportion of infected pigs with low-intensity cyst burden
chi

Average number of pork meals (200g portion) per person per month
RR_cysticercosis

Risk multiplier for Cysticercosis if human has Taeniasis
epsilon

Pig rate of loss of naturally aquired immunity
RR_infection

Increased RR of infection given consumption of high cyct burden pork, compared with low cyst burden
RR_consumption

Decreased RR of consumption of high cyst burden pork, compared with low cyst burden pork

Value

Two lists of parameters and state variable values

Contents
